summary:
I moved to Netherland in 2015 for family reunion. Before that, I was sales and marketing director for an IT company that have 20 years experienced to provide IT service for the Bank of China, State Grid Corporation of China, Chinese government and military etc.. Before this, I had two years of training in Europe. Prior to my return from Europe, I was the country business manager for Greefa VA International B.V. with full P/L responsibility. I had expended market from zero to ten million and established a sales office and sales support team. With many years of import/ export as well as local production experience, I am well round in trade finance, marketing and operation.
I had been in business world for nearly 19 years at Joint-Venture companies in China. While working in various business categories, covering from IT business, the mechanical & power industry, B to B internet business, and the agriculture to the culture heritage preservation, I had accumulated plenty of across culture multi-national business experiences, with specific focus on great China business development.
